name: com.sharedunityservices.coroutines
description: Dependencies: https://github.com/sharedunityservices/SharedServices..Core.git Overview: This package provides a simple way to use coroutines in Unity. It is built on top of the SharedServices.Core package and uses the SharedServices.Locator package to locate the services. Features: - CoroutineService: A service that allows you to start and stop coroutines. - CoroutineRunner: A MonoBehaviour that runs the coroutines. How to use: - Add the SharedServices.Core and SharedServices.Locator packages to your project. - Add the SharedServices.Coroutines package to your project. - Use the CoroutineService to start and stop coroutines.
